data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Dodoma that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Dodoma, Tanzania
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Dodoma, Tanzania to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 1,854,619 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Dodoma, Tanzania so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Dodoma to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Alagwa people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Alagwa people know you.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Dodoma words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 1,018,593 who are far from you in Dodoma, Tanzania from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Dodoma, Tanzania.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

location.name: Dodoma
location.people_groups_list: Datooga, Sandawe, Gujarati Creole, Iraqw, Hindi
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Datooga (14,000), Sandawe (76,000), Gujarati Creole (84,000), Iraqw (872,000), Hindi (68,000)
